summary: Completed frontend testing of Sharda HR HRMS Payroll Rules Engine and KPI creation features. Successfully verified KPI creation dialog with Period Type dropdown and template selection. Encountered session timeout issues preventing complete Payroll Rules testing, but code analysis confirms implementation.

session_management.issue: Very short session timeouts causing frequent logouts during testing
session_management.impact: Prevents thorough UI testing and user experience issues

passed_tests: Login functionality with admin credentials (admin@shardahr.com / Admin@123)
KPI creation dialog opening via 'New KPI' button
Period Type dropdown presence and functionality
Selected Period date range calculation and display
KPI Records display with existing quarterly reviews
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider implementing longer session timeouts or session refresh mechanism to improve user experience during extended use. The current short session timeout makes it difficult for users to complete complex tasks without being logged out.
